text: How to parse just the text from a Word Doc using Python?
When you try opening a MS Word document or for that matter most Windows file formats, you will see gibberish as given below broken intermittently by the actual text.
I need to extract the text that goes in and want to ignore the gibberish -- which is something like given below.
How do I extract only the text that matters, and ignore rest of the stuff.
Here's a sample of open("sample.doc",r").read() of a word doc.

Transcend came a close second, was seen to be more popular among class A city based resellers, was also the most recalled memory brand among customers according to resellers.
